reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 328/01: DEADLINE FOR ESTABLISHING 2001 TAX RATIOS
reg_info.act_under: Municipal Act   Loi sur les municipalités

content.content: 1. September 30, 2001 is the last day on which the following upper-tier or single-tier municipalities may pass a by-law pursuant to subsection 363 (3) or (4) of the Act establishing tax ratios for the 2001 taxation year: 1. Township of Red Rock. 2. Township of Sioux Narrows Nestor Falls. 3. Township of Terrace Bay. 4. Township of Blind River. 5. Municipality of Greenstone. 6. City of Hamilton. 7. City of Greater Sudbury. O. Reg. 328/01, s. 1.
content.raw_html:
1. September 30, 2001 is the last day on which the following upper-tier or single-tier municipalities may pass a by-law pursuant to subsection 363 (3) or (4) of the Act establishing tax ratios for the 2001 taxation year:

1. Township of Red Rock.

2. Township of Sioux Narrows Nestor Falls.

3. Township of Terrace Bay.

4. Township of Blind River.

5. Municipality of Greenstone.

6. City of Hamilton.

7. City of Greater Sudbury.

O. Reg. 328/01, s. 1.

content.content: 2. November 30, 2001 is the last day on which the following municipalities may pass a by-law pursuant to subsection 363 (3) of the Act establishing tax ratios for the 2001 taxation year: 1. Town of Gananoque. 2. City of Kenora. O. Reg. 128/02, s. 1.
content.raw_html:
2. November 30, 2001 is the last day on which the following municipalities may pass a by-law pursuant to subsection 363 (3) of the Act establishing tax ratios for the 2001 taxation year:

1. Town of Gananoque.

2. City of Kenora.

O. Reg. 128/02, s. 1.
